EmailTemplate.name: OSS_Webinar_10AM Comprehensive Spring Showcase: Personal Cloud Storage App.Remin
EmailTemplate.subject: Webinar Reminder: A Comprehensive Spring Showcase: Personal Cloud Storage Application
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=There}}, We are looking forward to having you join us for tomorrow's webinar A Comprehensive Spring Showcase: Personal Cloud Storage Application with Erdem Gunay. If you haven't done so yet, we recommend that you join a test meeting before the session to check your system and browser compatibility at http://www.webex.com/test-meeting.html. Event Details:
Date: Tuesday, June 9, 2015
North America: 10:00am PDT (San Francisco, GMT-07:00) Join the WebEx <https://pivotal-io.webex.com/pivotal-io/onstage/g.php?MTID=e93ee1d5cb7dba543724a9d8c50634f58> Dial In: US TOLL FREE+1-855-749-4750 US TOLL+1-415-655-0001 Show toll-free dialing restrictions
Access code: 666 174 088
Thank you,
